mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `team` (version, `name`, date_created, last_updated) VALUES (#{version}, #{name}, NOW(),NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE version = version + 1, `name` = #{name}, last_updated = NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE `team` SET version = version + 1, `name` = #{name}, last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, u.id AS user_id, u.version AS user_version, u.account_expired AS user_account_expired, u.account_locked AS user_account_locked, u.enabled AS user_enabled, u.password AS user_password, u.password_expired AS user_password_expired, u.username AS user_username, u.real_name AS user_real_name FROM `team` t LEFT JOIN `user` u ON t.id = u.team_id WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` (version, account_expired, account_locked, enabled, password, password_expired, username, real_name, team_id) VALUES (#{version}, #{accountExpired}, #{accountLocked},#{enabled},#{password},#{passwordExpired},#{username},#{realName}, #{team.id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE version = version + 1, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, password_expired = #{passwordExpired}, enabled = #{enabled}, account_expired = #{accountExpired}, account_locked = #{accountLocked}, real_name = #{realName}, team_id = #{team.id}
